channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CO

item.title: Report X-2025030056
item.description:
Report X-2025030056

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-05T18:18:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-26
  • City: DENVER
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: During sort operations at the DENR location a fiberboard box was discovered with signs of a release. While investigating the shipment the spill agent found two plastic bottles inside and the caps were loose on both causing the release. The contents were a UN1170 and there were no DG markings or paperwork on the outer fiberboard box. The shipment was placed into a steel salvage package and is being held at the location.

  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
